In England, in the seven days to 06 March, there were 33,952 new confirmed cases (60.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 27 February, there were 48,743 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 30% (14,791 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 11 March is 3,713,743 (6,597.9 cases per 100,000 population).
